name: Modular Mothership
description:
CONTROLS:

  • WSAD - Move around
  • SPACE - Shoot
  • To pause the game you can click off the game screen
  • There's no way to restart the game other than refreshing the page, sorry :(

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Pick up guns to make yourself stronger
  • Avoid enemy bullets. You can get a sense of how much damage a bullet will do by looking at its size
  • BUG: When you get new weapons, you need to press space again for them to shoot
  • Try to beat my High Score (504,395):
